title: $:/plugins/flibbles/relink-fieldnames
author: Flibbles
name: Relink Field Names
description: Renames field names with titles matching Relinked tiddlers
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://github.com/flibbles/tw5-relink">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://github.com/flibbles/tw5-relink"/> \whitespace trim Enables Relink to relink field names associated with renamed tiddlers. The following fields cannot be interacted with in this way: <<< <$set name=blacklisted filter={{$:/config/flibbles/relink-fieldnames/blacklist!!filter}}> ''<$list counter=counter filter="[enlistsort[]]"> <>
'' <<< See the tw5-relink website for more details and examples.
